package.description: Multi-Robot Patrolling Stage/ROS Simulation Package. Composed of 7 running algorithms: - Heuristic Pathfinder Conscientious Cognitive (HPCC / c_cognitive) - Conscientious Reactive (CR / c_reactive) - Heuristic Conscientious Reactive (HCR / hc_reactive) - Cyclic Algorithm for Generic Graphs (CGG / cyclic) - Generalized Multilevel Subgraph Patrolling Algorithm (MSP / msp) - Greedy Bayesian Strategy (GBS / gbs) - State Exchange Bayesian Strategy (SEBS / sebs)
package.author: David Portugal
